query:
ALTER TABLE challenge_submissions 
ADD COLUMN score DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN reviewerComments TEXT,
ADD COLUMN publicVotes INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN judgeVotes INT DEFAULT 0;
